name: lightning-pay
description: lightning-pay allow for payment of several kinds of bills (including airtime, data bundles, Internet, electricity and cable TV) in Nigeria and across multiple African countries.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.dev: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run dev --prefix server

author: Samuel Aspirin & David Kazeem
